description: All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be submitted on or before May 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. The procurement is for the acquisition of 10 custom LEO turret mounts, including delivery to Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
duration_in_months: The Contract is expected to begin on or after May 15, 2024
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Acquisition of LEO Turret Mounts

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, issues this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of 10 custom LEO turret mounts. The procurement is being conducted in an open and competitive manner.

### Key Information

* **Publication Date**: March 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 23, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date**: May 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 14, 2024
* **Procurement Category**: Government Defense
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements.

### Bidder Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

The tender consists of the acquisition of 10 custom LEO turret mounts, including delivery to Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time) on May 23, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. Please refer to the attached URL for the full tender notice: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15832682?extsite=MTU4MzI2ODJfQU4wMT
